name: Face 47 - ENERGY BLOCKS
description:
.GIF Performance

Made by authorial photo collages with physical sculpture (concrete and objects found in the streets) from Energy Blocks (Blocos de Energia) series, project in development since 2018.///2021

The "Energy Blocks" concept was inspired by the quantum world, and the way patterns work in energy block packages to materialize everything around us, paradoxically humanity's excessive consumerism generates mountains of garbage wherever we go and I ask, do people see themselves or take social responsibility? All this is you and me, do you see yourself?


#auniseiva #gifperformance
